item.description:
We've all been exposed to religious members handing out flyers at airports and knocking on doors. Do you welcome proselytizing or shrink from it? Do you proselytize atheism? Is trying to educate others about atheism the same as being preached to? Is trying to convert others to atheism a necessary evil, or a bad idea?

At this meeting, we will explore the process of conversion from one belief system to another. What approach is best, if any, to educate people about things like evolution and science?
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a group talking about atheism and/or wearing atheist sweatshirts.
item.name: Sunday Morning Topical Meeting: Proselytizing and Conversion
